scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = '.next'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Cleaned .next directory'); } else { console.log('.next directory does not exist'); }"
scripts.clean:all: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const dirs = ['.next', 'node_modules/.cache']; dirs.forEach(d => { if (fs.existsSync(d)) { fs.rmSync(d, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log(`Cleaned ${d}`); } });"
